rules.title: Solo mode
content: This mode allows you to play alone against the computer. Just be the first to line up 4 chips
of your color horizontally, vertically or diagonally. If during a game, all the chips are played
without any chip rows, the game is declared a draw.

rules.title: Classic mode
content: This mode allows you to play with 2 to 5 people. The goal is to align horizontally, vertically or
diagonally as many checkers selected in the game creation options.
You can also change the dimensions of the grid.

rules.title: Time attack
content: This mode allows you to play with 2 to 5 people. The goal remains the same as the classic
mode with the only difference that you must play within a set time.
Game options are always available to customize your game.

rules.title: Roulette mode
content: In this mode of play you will be led at the beginning of each turn to receive a randomly
chosen pawn with a special feature. The game is played by 2 to 5 people, game creation options are
available to customize the grid of your game and the number of checkers to line up to win.
